website_summaries.verdict: While it has some good qualities and features, other brands work just as well at lower price points.
pros: works on most stains and surfaces
Can also be used as a stain treatment for some garments
cons: Mixed opinions on the scent – some say it's pleasant

website_summaries.verdict: Users who prefer a stronger scent may like this brand. It also works about as well as most of its competitors.
pros: Professional-level cleaning action that works to eliminate pet odors and stains on a variety of household surfaces
Doesn't require a lot to clean most stains and odors
cons: Some users reported continual marking even after use
While some liked the scent, others reported that it was too strong and just seemed to "mask" odors

customer_reviews.title: Instant stain removal, smells great!
customer_reviews.text: Y'all, just buy this stuff. I've been trying to get puppy stains out our rentals carpets for a LONG time. I even tried a bleach mix. These photos were taken a half hour apart. The directions recommend spraying the stain and letting it sit for 10 min before wiping with a cloth. When I came back after 10 min, I couldn't even tell where I needed to wipe because the stains were already gone! I was hesitant to spend $40 on carpet cleaner when resolve is like 5 bucks, but this is definitely worth the $$!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Looper

customer_reviews.title: it is an excellent cleaner too
customer_reviews.text: It's a miracle. Started with cat infested hoarder house....needed to wear a carbon filter mask to work in it when it wasn't treated. Carpet was already out of house so cats were going directly on concrete floor. This product was used on all floors and most painted walls and doors. I stopped using the mask after half of the floors were treated. In addition to the incredible odor eliminating quality, it is an excellent cleaner too! It has a very pleasant smell (kind of like bubble gum) and it absolutely works. Treated entire 3 bedroom house with 8 gallons. Will buy more for adding to laundry-tub to deoderize curtains. It really works. Everyone that returned to the house was amazed!
customer_reviews.author: Nick L.

customer_reviews.title: Performs as well as a more expensive brand
customer_reviews.text: I am longtime Rocco & Roxie user, but decided to try Bubba's based on price alone. It performs just as well as far as I can tell for both urine and poo. The only difference is the scent. Bubba's has a clean smell that reminds me of a fabric refreshening spray, whilst Rocco & Roxie has an earthy, almost licorice scent. I will continue to buy Bubba's and have even changed my subscribe & save to include it.
customer_reviews.author: Caley G

customer_reviews.title: Stands out in a crowded field of so-called pet odor removers, this one really works!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried every pet odor product out there and am really really impressed by this one. The staff has been great about answering my questions in the best way to use it, and the product itself totally works. There are several dogs here trying to out-mark each other and I keep a bottle of this spray handy at all times. I just ordered a gallon replacement!
customer_reviews.author: croxandsoxTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! ABOVEVAND BEYOND! I have tried muitiple cleaners/ deodorizer, but this one us the best! We have a cat rescue and this by far is the best. You must follow instruxtions but well worth the money. A little gowes a long way. We have it in a spray bittle and use it fir both little and big messes. Destroyed the urine!
customer_reviews.author: Koko's Organics

customer_reviews.title: The product did not do what it said it would do, and for the price was dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: The product did not keep the dogs from using the surface again, which meant that it never removed the urine smell. The puppies could still smell where it was and they would still go back to the same spot. It did clean up ok but did not do what it said it would do. For the price you paid for it we were very disappointed. Would not work very good to remove pet urine.
customer_reviews.author: TERRI LOWE

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING - does what it says. Period!
customer_reviews.text: It's simply AMAZING. Follow the instructions and BOOM, no more stains, no odors, NOTHING!!! I will try to take photos and update my review, yo just have to see this baby in action! My puppy training days will be easier now, and of course my sanity will be restored when food get's in the rug. Oh and taking off the pee was my goal but it even took some dirt (like dry mud) with it and left no stain or color! So so good! So happy with my purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too fragrant that it enhances the smell of urine
customer_reviews.text: The smell is too fragrant and it actually enhanced the urine smell in my carpet. Definitely will not buy again and definitely do not recommend. Waste of money. Should've purchased a smaller size to try out first.
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: definitely works
customer_reviews.text: I have tried every natural pet stain and odor cleaner over the years. Some work better than others. I like Fizion, and some others. But Bubba's has a pleasant smell and does really work. If you use too much, the smell can be overwhelming but it fades. I have used on hard floors, wood floors, and bedding. All good. We tried the small size to sample and wound up buying the gallon size and are nowhere near done with it.
customer_reviews.author: croxandsoxTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I used it on concrete slab and carpet. The ...
customer_reviews.text: I used it on concrete slab and carpet. The product arrived on time and left a very pleasant odor, knocking out the pet smell in the carpet. The slab needs a bit more work. (It was saturated and covered with pet soil over 100% of the square footage of the property). Order 1 bottle per 1000 square feet. I've ordered it again and again. It works!
customer_reviews.author: Chrystal

customer_reviews.title: Easy and It works!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 8 cats that sprayed my walls then it dripped down on my carpet. This cleaned everything and the smell is completely gone. So easy to use. I used a 2 gallon sprayer and coated everything then just let it dry. No staining or having to repaint.
customer_reviews.author: Diane McDonald

customer_reviews.title: No Instructions??!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this product because there are no instructions on the bottle. Instead, the bottle tells you to text a word to a number. I did that, expecting and automatic response and nothing. Suggest you just send instructions with the bottle since I am sure I will use this product for many different areas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best we've used so far with our five animals.
customer_reviews.text: We had a major cat-tastrophre, and with my husband's boss about to visit, needed something to clean up the mess our three cats had created (a hidden spot in which they had been peeing for awhile). After finding the source of the smell we used two other cleaners that helped, but this one finally did the job. We love it and will always have some on hand now.
customer_reviews.author: LVogel

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is the real deal. I used it ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the real deal. I used it on a very old (30years+) very stained carpet and the results were unbelievable. I've probably gone over this stain, which was caused by a very sick dog, a dozen times with bissel and other cleaners but the combination of Bubba's stain remover and carpet cleaner did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Garret

customer_reviews.title: This is the best product for pet messes
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing!!!!! My cat had outgrown his litter box and his urine was going straight onto the concrete floor. Even though I thought I cleaned it up really well the smell seemed to reactivate with high humidity or rain and the entire house smelled awful. I brought one bottle of this poured it straight on the spot and let it sit overnight. When I went back in the morning the smell was completely gone!! It’s been over a week multiple humid rainy days and no smell!!! I was so pleased I brought another bottle and a bigger littler box lol
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Bubbas carpet cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I used a black-light flashlight to find old dog pee stains on two wool rugs. Stains were impossible to see because of the Oriental patterns. Bubbas Carpet Cleaner broke up the stains (under black-light again) and replaced the pee smell with a spicy/floral fragrance (that can be a bit powerful). I used the product recently so I'm not sure how long the fragrance will last. Didn't seem to discolor the rug any. Also used it on a fresh pee stain on upholstery with synthetic fabric. No stain. No smell. Very happy about that one.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Worked but more expensive than I'm willing to pay for it again.
customer_reviews.text: This worked for me where I used it. I dumped it over the set in stains I had and let it sit over night. I wish it wasn't so expensive though. The cost caused me to buy other brand cleaners afterward that were less expensive because I only had enough for half of the room I was doing. It does have that minty bubblegum smell that lasts for about a week and then starts to gently fade (it's not all the way gone though).
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Works on Cat Urine & Feces -- Better than competitor!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!! I have a cat that pees on clothes if the litter box is not cleaned immediately (he also will pee when I travel for more than two days). He also has recently pooped on some stuff that I had in a closet. I was unable to get the completely pee odor out after using an enzyme I'd used previously & poop odor wouldn't go away...and I found myself using a lot more than I'd had in the past. I decided to look for an alternate pet odor remover - based on the reviews, I decided to try Bubba's. First load was the items he pooped on - odor GONE! Second load - items with cat pee - odor GONE!!
customer_reviews.author: HappyAppy95

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Work
customer_reviews.text: I tried this right after my dog had diarrhea on my carpet. I immediately cleaned up what I could and then applied the solution immediately to the soiled areas. Let it set for 30 minutes but it did nothing, so therefore I used my Kirby to shampoo the carpet and then put more of the solution on and let set for 1 hour. Shampooed again and still very little came out. So I then put bleach in my carpet cleaner machine and some more came out but still have a lot more to try and get out.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Gale

customer_reviews.title: Odor Terminator Extraordinaire
customer_reviews.text: We are renovating an old cabin in NC. It had sat vacant for nearly 10 years and was full of decaying matter. In the heat of the day, the upstairs was ripe with odor. We tried cleaning with bleach solutions which did not begin to put a dent on the situation. So - we turned to "google" which led us to Bubba's. Sprayed directly on the walls (wood), rubbed it in with a cloth and noticed an immediate difference. A week later -- still no smell. Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Susan M.

customer_reviews.title: Smell GONE!
customer_reviews.text: The room I sprayed smells fresh and clean. (Used on carpet. ) Love the fragrance. The room was occupied by a former roommate. It needed some major cleaning. After I shampooed carpet it did smell fresh, once the fragrance of carpet cleaner w/frebreeze was gone there was an odor of pet urine. I was stumped. We had no pets. I thought the odor was coming from outside the window, but no I got down on the floor and the carpet smelled bad and smelled like pet urine. GOOGLED pet urine and so I ordered BUBBA spray. It worked for me! THANK YOU!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura S.

customer_reviews.title: Bye bye stupid cat...smell.
customer_reviews.text: Great product on concrete cat urine odor. One gallon bottle did a 14’x16’ room. And BONUS, both the annoying cat and the wife that was attached to it are now gone! Couldn’t ask for a better product for odor elimination
customer_reviews.author: 6uper8ee

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! I'm blown away after cleaning my hallway and ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I'm blown away after cleaning my hallway and bedroom carpets where my re-lapsed "potty trained" 2yr old rescue Schnauzer has started peeing in our house away. I was about to lose my mind and we can't afford to re-carpet or get new floors right now. I used this in a Hoover carpet cleaner mixed with some water and it worked like magic on the stains! We'll see if it helps with potty training in regards to her going back to the old stain spots.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla W.

customer_reviews.title: Bubbas Super Strength Odor Remover
customer_reviews.text: A friend uses this, and I was having a problem with my male kitty, peeing. I bought this, after using it once, this product did absolutely nothing, it does have a faint lime smell, but did not remove the odor of cat pee. Again, I contacted Amazon, about returning, they gave me a credit immediately, told me I did not need to return. I then threw the bottle away.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Girl

customer_reviews.title: Out Performed Expectations for Urine Neutralization
customer_reviews.text: This product out performed my expectations when it comes to urine neutralization. There are better rug cleaners for pet stains, but this product out performed every product I've tried to get rid of urine smell. It did such a good job that my dog no longer sniffs the area - before he would sniff the area and then decide it was okay to urinate again in the location. Also, the smell of the product is quite pleasant unlike some of the more harsh cleaners that over power your nose. I would recommend this product and will definitely buy it again when I run out of the current supply.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Still smelling cat urine
customer_reviews.text: This product claims it will eliminate pet urine but after 2 applications the smell is still there and therefore I wasted a lot of money with no results. Was hoping this would be the one that worked as I tried a couple of other brands but like them this seemed to work the first few hours but then after that the smell came back. Will not buy this product again nor recommend it to any of my animal friend owners with the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Bailey

customer_reviews.title: I've tried everything on the retail market and was not happy. Here comes Bubba's and I'm in love
customer_reviews.text: 3 dogs + beige carpet = disaster. Found Bubba's here on Amazon and thought I'd give it a try. I've tried everything on the retail market and was not happy. Here comes Bubba's and I'm in love. Easy to use.. Best thing for pet stains. Love! Love! Love it!! I won't use anything else. Stains are gone.. Yay! Thank you Bubba!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not deter male from marking.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a gallon on this because it said it removes odors and help prevent dogs from marking the same spot again. It did none of that. I cleaned and retreated 4 times and after every time my dog remarked the spots on furniture and flooring. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: L.Profeta

customer_reviews.title: Good product, a bit expensive for large areas to treat
customer_reviews.text: It has taken 2 applications to remove most of the urine odor from wood subfloors. It did not take the odor out of the carpet, no matter how many times I tried. We had to remove the worst carpeted areas and treat flooring underneath. The scent is very nice. I prefer this brand to others I have tried. The price is a bit hefty though. In the worst areas, I did follow the treatment with baking soda and peroxide, which I let air dry. It seemed to help a lot. We had a pretty bad home to rehab, and this product seemed to be the only one that worked.
customer_reviews.author: cmwagen

customer_reviews.title: Really Just Masks Smell with Somewhat Less Terrible Smell
customer_reviews.text: Followed the instructions (which are far more involved than the listing would have you believe) and I ended up with a house that smelled like some sort of weird chemical throat lozenge. I gave it two stars because the rug no longer smelled of urine - it just...smelled like a morgue, but it didn't keep the dog from finding the spot she pees on and doing it all over again (which is what the enzyme cleaning is supposed to prevent). Hence, a waste of 35 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Head Cheeze

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t help with cat urine odor
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping this would work. We have a cat with bladder cancer who eliminates inappropriately. I texted for directions and used as directed on wood floors and carpet and it doesn’t remove the odor. I also tried in the laundry and I actually think it made the odor worse. Natures Miracle works the best in the wash. A cocktail of 3 different enzyme cleaners, baking soda and peroxide was pretty successful on our flooring. This was the least effective of any Ove tried.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: gets stains out and gets smells out.
customer_reviews.text: Before and after pictures posted. I really think they speak to the quality of the product. Not only did they get dog throw up and a cat feces stain out of my carpet, but it got the smell completely out too. The smell of the product itself isnt like your normal cleaning type scents but once you use it, it neutralizes the pet odor in the carpet and then you cant smell the pet smell or the product at all. It also brought a new whiteness back to my carpet, it makes me want to try some in my shampooer! I would definitely recommend the product :)
customer_reviews.author: Mommyonamission

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: Sadly this did nothing for me. My pup decided to spite pee on my throw blanket, I used bubbas, let it sit then laundered it (air dried it too) Nothing I related the process throughly soaking the blanket as suggested for hard to get out stink. Still the pee stink remained. I then used another product, washed with vinegar in the wash and rinse cycle and finally the smell is gone. Sorry bubbas you and roxie’s just don’t cut it.
customer_reviews.author: bakeyou

customer_reviews.title: Bogus
customer_reviews.text: I have two dogs here. One is a 9 month old Pitbull, who is not fully trained to go outside. While using this product, it smelled nice. I left and went to work, when i came home in the morning, the entire house smelled like feet! I have never had that problem! Now i won’t use the product again and it’s a $40 waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Dinky

customer_reviews.title: Not As Good As Rocco &Roxie
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product first to try to resolve the "spraying" battle I have going on with my cats. This product is extremely industrial strength and sudsy. It hurt my lungs and put me into an immediate asthma attack (which rarely happens) after applying to the spots. The fumes are almost caustic. Worst part was as hard as we tried sucking up all the suds from the spots, they just kept coming. As far as removing smells, I'd say it removed about 60%. After using this products , I purchased Rocco & Roxie. Not as caustic, but still very strong and hard on the lungs. However, it removed all new smells and the ones Bubbas left behind 100%. Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: I am so disappointed it did not work
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews and was excited to get the product. Unfortunately it did not work as stated. The urine smell partially went away for a couple days and then returned with a vengeance and the carpet stains returned in a week. I am so disappointed it did not work. Definitely not as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Wallace

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Tis is the BEST STAIN & ODOR remover I have ever used, I used a squirt bottle on light areas and poured a little bit on bad stain and odor areas let set for 20 min then used my carpet cleaner and BUBBAS mixed with HOT water and WOW carpet looks like new and smells clean and this is from yrs of 2 different dog pee that was in the house, buying more to clean the rest of the carpe, still have a 1/2 gallon left
customer_reviews.author: Dwana Lauze

customer_reviews.title: Totally ROCKS!! I LOVE this product!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 dogs with health issues and it seems like I'm always cleaning up a mess! Worse thing is when I don't catch it quickly and clean up later! This works on new and old stains and odors. On the old you need to treat it in stages, but will be very pleased with the results!! You will see the old stain wick into the paper towel as you treat the stain and repeat the process! Compared to the price that pro's charge to come out, this is an incredible way to keep up with the messes! I highly recommend this cleaner and the carpet cleaner also if you own a machine!
customer_reviews.author: Bella's MomTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Move over Nature's Miracle
customer_reviews.text: I stood by Nature's Miracle for many years, (in previous residence with different animals) but this time it didn't work as well. I have a senior dog with some incontinence issues and needed help! Bubbas is wonderful! The smell is gone, in addition to the black light no longer showing any residual urine left. Please note that this is not for stain removal, but full urine eliminator. It also has a mild but clean smell. I have a very sensitive sense of smell and can't handle the perfume fragrance that accompanies so many cleaning products. Thank you Bubbas! It worked like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Howard

customer_reviews.title: The odor is not bad at all- a little sweet
customer_reviews.text: I have tried EVERYTHING! Nature's mirical, no spray products, etc. I poured the bottle on the cart and let it sit overnight. The odor is not bad at all- a little sweet. In the morning I used my carpet cleaner. It's the first time i used a produxt with no residual urine smell. Thank you!!! I've bought 2 more bottles since.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work under a black light test...
customer_reviews.text: My carpet is beige, it doesn’t have any visible stains because I would clean up really fast after the accident. BUT I have OCD with sanitation and cleanliness so I bought a black light and wow did my carpet glow in my pets favorite potty spots! He is potty trained now so I’ve been researching the best way to remove those stains that are not visible to the naked eye and it turns out commercial strength enzyme is the way to go, thought I found it here but I didn’t. I’m sure this product works fine but it didn’t do what I needed it to do.
customer_reviews.author: La_Chupacabraj

customer_reviews.title: Get rid of the smell... not the cat.
customer_reviews.text: Got this because our cat decided to pee on a fabric generator cover 🙄. As everyone knows- cat urine is the nastiest stuff on the planet. It oughta be used in chemical warfare. Thoroughly sprayed this stuff on it and thank the universe it worked!!!! So the cat gets to live another day... JK. Thought it was funny that there was a pic of a mastiff on the spray bottle- so my mastiff posed along side it 😏. Stuff is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Slee8391

customer_reviews.title: If it sounds too good to be true, it probably is
customer_reviews.text: I noticed the strong scent when I opened the jug, but I thought it was going to "neutralize" once applied to the odor. Not the case, considering the instructions say to use a "liberal" amount. The product itself doesn't seem to work either since my cat keeps peeing in the same spot. Now with the carpet drenched in the product plus the additional urine, the smell is much worse.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie Mama NJ

customer_reviews.title: Works better than other things i've tried
customer_reviews.text: Works better than other things i've tried. Odor is not that strong... but it will take a day or two to go away. Pretty sure it has ammonia in it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Parrow

customer_reviews.title: I’ve used 2 bottles already!
customer_reviews.text: I run a pet sitting business plus I have 8 pets of my own (and 2 kids) this stuff is a godsend . Gets out dog pee, cat pee, bunny pee and those mystery stains that are in the kids rooms lol this stuff helps so much. The scent is super strong though I end up coughing while using it and the kids complain about the weird smell but it fades after a day or two. I would probably still use it even if didn’t lol it doesn’t smell bad just Strong.
customer_reviews.author: Zarah

customer_reviews.title: The best I’ve ever used.
customer_reviews.text: This odor eliminator is amazing! My senior cat started peeing on the carpet. The odor was horrendous and the nature’s miracle wasn’t cutting it. I order this as a last resort and it was amazing! I cleaned all of the old enzyme cleaner out of the carpet and applied the Bubba’s and it worked. The scent is 100 times better than other enzyme cleaners and worked in a third the time! Entirely worth h the risk and the price. I definitely recommend this product to anyone with cats and dogs. And yes it works for dog odors too. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Gutzwiller

customer_reviews.title: This product really works!!
customer_reviews.text: the previous owner of my home had to large dogs that left a noticeable order. I have purchased a handful of 4 star rug cleaning products that in my experience fell short of the advertised claims. But this one and the cleaner performed a remarkable job. On pet stains and smells. Ill not buy another brand again . Bubba’s has earned my commitment by its quality of products and customer support/service. I can honestly say that of all the rug cleaning products I've purchased Bubba’s company is the only one that took the initiative . First contact and is very helpful on how to get the results I desired. Thank you. Dragon reader.
customer_reviews.author: Silumtao Dragon Reader

customer_reviews.title: The smell oh my goodness amazing!!!! <3
customer_reviews.text: I love how bubbas comes in just a regular bottle and a huge bottle to refill it. It does have a shut off turn! It smells so good like a peppermint smell to it. It deoderizes amazingly I have a boy cat that sprays and a boy dog and this got on the smell instantly I'm in love my new favorite! A continual use from me! A little goes a long ways! If your looking for something to get an order out that's ok for pets as well you have to at least give this stuff a try it magic in a bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlyann555

customer_reviews.title: Abandoned cat house
customer_reviews.text: Full disclosure, used in abandoned house that had cats living in it for a year plus. I cleaned everything with water, scrubbed with nylon brush, wiped with sponge, and then sprayed with bubba's. Reapply several times that day. It's better, but odor is not eliminated. I don't know if I should try another brand? This is guaranteed, but after talking to company, seems like they are going to say that it has to work and it's something I did to screw it up. I guess I could call to find our for sure. Good luck with your cleaning project
customer_reviews.author: I'm That Guy

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: I soaked my area rug with this. Did not work. I tried it all. You just cannot get cat urine out of a carpet. Used an extractor first, several times. Power washed it with this and many other cleaners. Left the carpet hanging on a clothes line for 8 months. Still nothing. I was determined to get this carpet rid of cat urine stink. A little OCD on my part. Threw the carpet away finally.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer T

customer_reviews.title: Nothing else worked! So impressed
customer_reviews.text: My cat is a spiteful hooligan and was peeing under my computer desk trying to break my spirit. Unfortunately for him, I am persistent. I attempted to clean the spot twice with Natures Miracle pet odor and stain remover and every time I used it the smell got WORSE. I then tried vinegar and baking soda which didn't do anything and instead the baking soda caked yellow and I almost threw up. I found this product and decided to buy it. I follow the instructions and poured this bad boy all over the spot. Soaked it. Left it overnight and the smell is now COMPLETELY GONE! Absolutely wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great smell, but...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item under the impression it was dilutable, i.e. 1 oz. to a gallon of water. It arrived with no dilution directions. Another product made by these people (Bubba's) said you can dilute, so I figured, why not get the gallon size and dilute away! Wrong. This is a nearly $40 NON-DILUTABLE solution. A bit of a rip off considering their "other" dilutable product would render much more for less money. Incidentally, their "other" product with same name, but dilutable, hides the number of ounces in the container photos... do you sense a littlt bit of deception here??
customer_reviews.author: Sharon M

customer_reviews.title: Great product - worked wonders!
customer_reviews.text: When my kitten peed on my bedding, this product worked wonders in removing the smell. I quickly stripped the bed and sprayed this product onto the wet patches and popped everything into the washing machine and waited 10 minutes before switching on the cycle. After washing and drying there was absolutely no trace of the pee; stain or odor. Great product and, should the need arise, I will definitely be buying it again. I will certainly be recommending it to freinds with pets!
customer_reviews.author: Louise C

customer_reviews.title: Works quite well, but beware if you have sensitivities
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually not that sensitive, I have 3 dogs that sometimes sleep in our bed. What I have noticed, is when I soak the carpet with this product, my asthma is triggered. I thought it was a one off last time, but I have since repurchased it, and it did the same thing this go around. I don't want to dissuade anyone from using this product, at all, it is phenomenal, and works EXACTLY as it advertises. That being said, asthma sufferers, be advised. I don't exactly know what was the trigger, but it was exhasurbated twice, during the usage of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dawnmichelle

customer_reviews.title: The ONLY odor eliminator you’ll ever need!
customer_reviews.text: With 2 big dogs (husky and German shepherd) and 3 cats, my carpet is always in need of a heavy duty pet odor eliminator. I have tried literally everything on the market and used natures miracle for a long time. Bubbas is the only product I use now. It is more expensive BUT I use less and IT WORKS. I keep this in a pressurized gallon pump sprayer (like you use for fertilizer or weed control outside) and it is always ready to spray as needed. I won’t go back to any other product.
customer_reviews.author: bnbnel

customer_reviews.title: I'm blown away
customer_reviews.text: This is a game changer. I have two severely autistic children that are not potty trained, two overly excitable dogs and four cats that stink for various reasons. I've tried so many outdoor products it's not funny. Bubbas leaves them in the dust. I have a sprayer for fabric refreshing the furniture and drapes. Just a splash in the wash gets all that funk out and leaves a light breezy almost minty scent.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Goad

customer_reviews.title: Just get it. You’ll be glad you did.
customer_reviews.text: Seriously. This stuff is a MUST HAVE for anyone with pets! Use it once in laundry (as opposed to washing over and over) or in the steam cleaner for carpet stains. Can also be used as a spot cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: S. Proctor

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: My son's female cat peed on our new couch (soaked one cushion). I bought this and drenched affected cushion. The smell of the product is awful to me (black licorice) and doesn't fade immediately when dry. The scent lingers for weeks. However, the horrific pee smell is gone and our couch was saved! Well worth the money and licorice smell for that result!
customer_reviews.author: Necia N Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Works excellent on both new and old stains!
customer_reviews.text: Bubba's super strength commercial cleaner will be my go to from now on. I have an older dog who sometimes can't hold her bladder and will pee in various spots on our cream colored carpet. I have tried several different brands of cleaner and while they took the discoloration out there was often still a faint urine smell after the carpet dried. Bubba's cleaner not only took out the stain but completely eliminated the urine smell. It also worked on older spots of the carpet that had been previously cleaned. Will definitely purchase more when this bottle runs out.
customer_reviews.author: dreamer68

customer_reviews.title: Bubbas is the best
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried them all. Bubba’s is by far the best. Hands down. It doesn’t have that sickly sweet perfume smell, but rather a much more pleasant one. Can’t really describe it, but it’s not offensive to me or the cats at all, even if you spray a lot. I like that as soon as it hits a spot, old or new, it starts bubbling like crazy. You can see and smell it working right away. A bad area had to be treated twice, but after that, perfect. I no longer can smell cat pee anywhere at all! I’m surprised and amazed that this product works so well. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Walker

customer_reviews.title: Cat urine eliminator
customer_reviews.text: I have an elderly cat who has started leaking and needed something quick. Cat pee is the most wicked smell in my opinion and so so hard to get out but this did the trick. Follow directions and your good to go!
customer_reviews.author: ashley nagel

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: I would say this is a really good product , the only thing is I would recommend using more cleaner than what your shampooer tells you too because it’s not strong enough for really touch stains and urine smells. I had to use double the amount to cover the smell. It doesn’t 100% eliminate older urine spots in the carpet but it does a good job masking it so I guess it’s worth the buy. It smells like mouthwash so it’s not an unpleasant smell. Just use more than you think you would need to.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Carr

customer_reviews.title: Strong, unpleasant, industrial-cleaner smell - going back to my old brand instead
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy Nature's Miracle Urine Destroyer but got a really good deal on this brand. Yikes, what a mistake! The smell is very strong and smells like inudstrial cleaner. I know this might be what some folks want, but it's not for me. I'm going back to my old brand. Unfortunately I spent a good chunk of change and bought a giant jug of this stuff based on the great reviews, so I'm going to see if perhaps our animal shelter can make use of it. I can't stand to just pour it down the drain, but it's definitely not going on my carpet...
customer_reviews.author: mm

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I used a half a gallon diluted ( 50:50) on artificial turf. My dog uses the turf for poop and pee. The smell , before treatment, was very bad on hot days. It smelled of ammonia. This product did alleviate the smell. However, it had its own artificial odor. It was kind of strong for a couple days but was not bad. After a couple of weeks the ammonia smell returned, but not as bad. The weather also got cooler. I'll save the other half gallon for next spring.
customer_reviews.author: Mark P.

customer_reviews.title: THIS WORKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many cleaners and odor removers in a room that my dogs have peed in. NOTHING would get the smell out. I was hesitant to buy this because of the price, but it got good reviews so I went ahead and did it. FANTASTIC!!!! I actually put it in my carpet cleaner without water or anything else and dispersed it that way since the instructions are to saturate the area for persistent odors. I then covered the carpet with towels and let it sit for several hours before sweeping in up with the carpet cleaner. I thought we were going to have to rip up the carpet, but the smell is gone. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa McCuistion

customer_reviews.title: Cannot say enough good about this carpet cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this out of desperation. My Biewer Terrier is a little over a year old and still not potty trained so I read where not just any cleaner or disinfectant would clean the urine out of the carpet. I knew my boy was smart enough to learn better than this. All I knew was I could not tolerate him urinating in the house so was hoping this would help us both. I cleaned the carpet 6 days ago and so far he has stopped peeing in the house. My dreams and prayers came true. Wish I had known this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: YorkieMom315

customer_reviews.title: I never leave reviews
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond amazed! I'll keep this short. I am a wildlife rehabber and have dogs, cats, prairie dogs etc so you can only imagine how nasty my carpet can get. We have tried literally EVERY cleaner and most work on stains but leave a weird odor mixed with animal smell. This product does not! This is the freshest my carpet has ever smelled AND the stains come right up. I wish I could buy their entire line of products
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: This did not work near as good as the brand that I purchased at another retailer. It did not eliminate the odors from rugs or blankets. I had to use twice as much to even get any results. My older cat sometimes has small accidents and I like to keep up with spots on my furniture and such, this does not do the job of cleaning or eliminating odor. Sorry but this is a honest review and is what I am known for.
customer_reviews.author: Deedee

customer_reviews.title: This actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I had a rescue cat that was shall we say a bit territorial. I had already tried everything else but still had the smell. I came across a review for Bubbas and decided I had nothing to lose. After two treatments the scent was GONE! The smell is light and it doesnt take much. The carpet looks and smells brand new again!
customer_reviews.author: Amy K

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders!
customer_reviews.text: I have an older dog, who has some old age issues and a cat who really hates me. This product works great for cleaning up urine, vomit, and fecal matter messes. I even used this product on my laundry(thanks to my evil cat), I just poured about 1/4C in the washer with my laundry, it got rid of the cat urine smell and the stains.
customer_reviews.author: Casper

customer_reviews.title: Secret to keeping crazy cat lady smell Gone!
customer_reviews.text: With a cavalcade of kittens I foster for my local humane society, my carpet see's it's fair share of kitten accidents! This stuff has been a Godsend! I keep a spray bottle filled with a little watered down mixture and prespray any accident areas. I have a carpet machine and then use the Bubbas in the machine. This "pincher" attack seems to keep the kittens pee smell at bay! I have fostered about 40 kittens in the past two years and Ive ordered Bubbas over and over! Love this stuff. My secret superhero status as a Crazy Cat Lady is safe with Bubbas!
customer_reviews.author: J. Long

customer_reviews.title: Works for us!
customer_reviews.text: We recently got a rescue dog, and he's not quite figured out that the house isn't the yard yet. I needed something that would help eliminate the tiny, undetectable-to-humans scents that must have been left behind, because he was making a habit out of a few spots in the house. I've only had to use it once on every spot (hardwood floors), and he's not been back to those spots in the last week or so. Fingers crossed this sticks! Another perk: this doesn't smell like chemicals as much as you'd expect. It kind of smells like those chalky valentine hearts.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie H

customer_reviews.title: No dog pee smell!!
customer_reviews.text: We had a room size area rug that had been peed on. After reading about this product, I called the company and talked to customer service about my issue. They were so helpful and suggested the best way to clean our carpet. I purchased 2 gallons of product and a garden sprayer. Diluted product 50:50 with water. Laid out a tarp and sprayed the backing first. Then flipped over and sprayed the pile. Left the carpet to soak fir 24 hours. Then power washed carpet until water ran clear. So happy with the end result. Saved us a lot of money in not having to replace our carpet!! Very happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Zolman

customer_reviews.title: Good for all laundry uses too
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey, but worth every penny. Personally, I use this for our pet's linens, blankets and towels, etc. However, I have a father who suffers from dementia and incontinence issues and this is the only thing, I've found, that helps with his laundry odors. My only problem was using too much at first. Because it is so concentrated and I was comparing to other products I've used I had a washer full of bubbles several times. However, I plan to put this item on auto-ship status.
customer_reviews.author: laura riley

customer_reviews.title: Bubbas is by far the best product I have found for removing pet stains/odors
customer_reviews.text: Bubbas is by far the best product I have found for removing pet stains/odors. I have a stubborn Havanese who likes to punish me by "missing" her pad on days she doesn't get enough attention. No matter what product I used, on warm days my office stunk! Until I found Bubba's. Took the odor and the stains right out of my carpet. The dog is still stubborn, but Bubba's has saved her from rehoming !
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Goetz

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: This did not in any way remove the cat urine smell from my rug. I used it exactly how I was supposed to. The smell is insanely strong and now all I smell are these awful chemicals plus cat pee. Using a black light, the urine stains are still there. The worst part though is the company ethics. They put at 100% guarantee on their bottle but will avoid honoring this at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Delaney

customer_reviews.title: A must have for any pet owner!
customer_reviews.text: I adore this! I have 2 Blue Heelers, they love to run around outside and they 'scent roll' too. Of course once they come back inside, they want to spread their new scent around the house too! OH NO! I spray this, let it sit and blot OR I saturate the area and then shampoo the carpets and the smell is gone. I use it on my couch, pillows, their beds and even toys (then wash them). Takes the dirty doggie smell away, leaves a light fresh scent behind and cleans dirt as well as scent. I would definitely suggest every pet owner having a bottle of this!!
customer_reviews.author: Diannah S.

customer_reviews.title: This stuff saved my carpet!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! I had a problem with my old cat not using his litter box and I thought I would certainly have to rip out my carpet because of the bad urine smell. Then I found Bubba's cleaning solution! I followed the directions exactly. I got a sprayer from the home improvement store to use for the water step and to apply the Bubba solution so I could have uniformity and to completely saturate the carpet. For the extraction, I used my Bissell carpet cleaner. This worked great, and my carpet is clean and no longer smells! I am thrilled that I didn't have to tear out / replace my carpet.
customer_reviews.author: mc in wi

customer_reviews.title: A Puppy Owners Must Have Product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. Having just added to new puppies to our family, we were in desperate need of a product to remove yellow pee stains and urine smell from a white...yes, bright white carpet. You can actually see the color vanish after putting some of the Terminator on the stain. I was thrilled with the results. The smell is eliminated immediately. Great product. I'll be buying more bottles for sure in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Morrison Russell

customer_reviews.title: Worked on Cement
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for cement that had been peed on by dogs. No directions on bottle and i texted the number provided and did not recieve anything so i just poured it on the area. I used a broom to get it in all the areas i wanted and let it sit for 24 hours. It smells slightly like black licorice. I found it pleasent. I never mopped it up, just let it dry up and the smell of the oroduct dissipated after a a few days. The dog urine smell WAS GONE. Pretty amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: L.

customer_reviews.title: Cat Urine Smell be Gone
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat with kidney disease that will often pee outside the litter box and in places I wish she wouldn't that are carpeted. I tried it out as soon as I got it because I am so tired of the nasty smell from cat urine. I have tried many different products and home remedy solutions and none of them take away the smell completely, but this worked. The smell seems to be completely gone for the first time and not just temporarily masked, so I am glad I did not just give up and gave this Pet Odor Eliminator from BUBBAS a chance. Thank you for making my house stop smelling like cat urine!
customer_reviews.author: Shop4holic

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Spot Remover for Animal Owners!!
customer_reviews.text: BUBBAS is a lifesaver for me!! With nine cats vomiting and 3 dogs that’s have accidents, I couldn’t ask for a better carpet cleaner. It cleans small and large spots. It even cleaned coffee out of my carpet where my Labrador/Collie got a little excited and knocked over my cup of coffee off the coffee table with his tail. It cleans all stains without color fading as well. Until I purchase my next home with no carpet, this is a God-send. I will still continue to purchase as a stain remover even then. Thank you for a great product!!
customer_reviews.author: EH

customer_reviews.title: This is great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This product is very superior on bare floors (like vinyl). I can't speak to how it does on carpet, but it has really helped me out with cleaning up after our elderly cat who doesn't seem to know where her butt is any more when she uses the litter box. Despite all my efforts to protect the floor around the litter box with pee pads, some still gets on the floor, and I have to clean the spot thoroughly at least once a day. This product has made my life easier and has greatly improved any lingering odor.
customer_reviews.author: Ardella Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Worked well!
customer_reviews.text: One of my cats peed on the outside of my new work bag and i decided to try and rescue it before buying a new one. I hung my bag outside and poured Bubba’s liberally to the affected area. Then I left it there overnight. The next day 90% of the odor was gone so I used more product and left it to dry. It worked! I am so pleased with Bubba’s even though it is a bit pricey. I had used another product for years but they have changed their formula and according to reviews, it does not work well as it had previously. I did not find Bubba’s odor to be a problem as some reviewers have said.
customer_reviews.author: shellseekers46

customer_reviews.title: Bubble gum
customer_reviews.text: It this since we have 4 little dogs and 1 Great Dane mix. Well the giant dog smells and makes everything smell like dog. Doesn't help that te dog doesn't get off the couch. It smells like the freebreazes commercials were you smell this and everyone else smells that. Which would be stinky dog. Got this and sprayed the couch and it smelled like bubble gum to me. It even got rid of the overpowering essential oil I put in the couch so I it can get rid I that I'm sure it dog rid of the dog smell. Now to see what people think when they come over for Xmas
customer_reviews.author: Jenene

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results !!!
customer_reviews.text: This product worked very well! My dog had been peeing on the concrete outside our patio door for months, I would wash it with everything I could find from bleach to ammonia to dawn even baking soda. She would continue to go there, and the SMELL!!!! Ugh so bad we couldn’t even open the door, and when we had parties everyone stayed inside the smell was so bad in the back yard!! I ordered this as my last attempt, my husband said if it doesn’t work we will have to break up that concrete and put new in. After one application the smell is completely gone and my dog has not gone there again!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever! Great scent!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! I originally bought it to remove a stain of my couch but I’ve since used it to clean the kitty litter! My cat tends to pee outside the litter and the urine smell gets unbearable! Regular cleaners do not remove the odor, but Bubbas does! Not only did it remove the stain from my couch but I now use this regularly when I empty the kitty litter to wash the inside and the smell goes away! Oh and the smell of this product is wonderful! I highly recommend this product and I will definitely be buying it again!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth & Diana Rosson

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: I was watching QVC or HSN not sure which one, but there was a shampooer I was looking at, and reading the reviews, one of which mentioned the Bubbas product. She raved about it. She like the machine, but truly raved about this product. I have 2 dogs, and the Yorkie Poo basically refuses to be potty trained unless I'm home. I ordered and my room smelled so good. There was no urine odor anywhere. I even went over area's that had been previously treated. I would have given it a 5 stars, but as we use to say in the Army, then there is no room for improvement. I am more than satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works super well, pricey but definitely gets into the concrete. Used on carpet first, it worked but let's be real, if that urine has had time to soak, you're not getting it all out. So, I came home one day and apparently decided I was capable of ripping out my carpet🤷 I was, but I didn't like doing it lol too much damn HGTV. Anyway, once I used it on the concrete the smell was 100% gone. Now, if only I could get people to stop pawning off their wayward dogs on me lol
customer_reviews.author: Babadook

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff! Correction, GREATEST.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blindly as I was, repeat WAS at wits end... Not anymore! This stuff WORKS!!! It gets rid of ALL the cat pee. Both stain and scent. I'm very impressed! The cat pissed on a work shirt of mine and I thought it was ruined as the stuff at the stores doesn't work at all for getting rid of cat piss. This product not only gets rid of the stain completely but totally eradicates the smell, even after a hard day at work and getting sweaty, the piss smell never came back. It works miracles on carpet and carpet padding too!!! So, if you're on the fence about the price... overlook that!!! Buy this product!!! It absolutely works.
customer_reviews.author: Salt Lake City, UT.

customer_reviews.title: Does what it claims
customer_reviews.text: Followed directions by using a steam cleaner with just water until it appeared to sucking clearish water. Used an entire gallon on the length of my hallway as my older cat has made a huge mess of it. Covered with towels for two hours and proceded to steam clean the enzyme cleaner up. No, it didn't clear up the smell 100%, but it decreased the smell by about 90% to barely perceptible to my super-powered nose and not at all perceptible to the majority of other visitors. I've purchased another gallon to retreat in a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: E. Radcliff

customer_reviews.title: Best stuff I've found for cat odors
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works and smells great. I have been having issues with one or more of my cats peeing on the carpet. No medical issues. Have tried numerous things and always treat areas as soon as I find them but can never get all the smell out. I used th his in combination with my bissell carpet cleaner and added my normal carpet shampoo and the oxy boost I normally add. What a difference it made! You can smell the difference as soon as you walk in the house. Pleasant smell, carpet looks great and did I mention, I have off white carpet? Really glad I found this stuff. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Hatch

customer_reviews.title: WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: Had an old oriental rug that smelled of urine whenever humidity was high. Was ready to throw it away. This was the only product that worked. Also worked when our son's large lab with a UTI peed on the rug. Cleaned first with wet cloth, then soaked with Bubba's (used heavy towels underneath so wouldn't be sitting wet on wood floors). NO URINE ODOR! Assuming product hasn't changed (bought 2014).has a strong unpleasant licorice smell whenapplied. Given its effectiveness, I'll deal with the smell. Getting ready to reorder... another visit from the lab, but this time my dog marked her territory.
customer_reviews.author: A. Quint

customer_reviews.title: too much soap in it
customer_reviews.text: I like the smell of this one and at first it seemed like it was working but within a few days the urine smell came back. Also it seems to have a lot of soap in it. I used it according to instructions then let it dry but it felt a little gummy after it dried so I ran my steam carpet cleaner over the dried carpet, using only clean water and it foamed up really badly, i had to rinse the carpet several times. It did clean the carpet really well though, probably because it has so much soap in it
customer_reviews.author: kelly weaver

customer_reviews.title: Highly, highly, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I seriously love this stuff. I followed the directions here on Amazon that said you had to wet the spot before you sprayed. I used warm water, waited, then used a deep cleaning machine with the carpet steam cleaner from Bubba's. This stuff worked so well that I will never use another brand. I will only use Bubba's from now on. The smell was interesting--sort of minty-ish, but not at all overwhelming or overpowering, unlike some perfume-y stuff. I even smelled that old perfume-y stuff after multiple Bubba's treatments, that's how strong that other stuff was! And it didn't even work, unlike Bubba's!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beats the Competition @ Deep Stain!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I didn't think anything could clean the spot where our elderly cat repeatedly peed! The whole room smelled of urine. We had tried Nature's... to no avail. Per instructions, we let it sit 24 hrs and vacuumed. Waaay better. Second application took care of it! Bought the gallon jug thinking it might not be enough but instead still have half of it left! Very pleased! Note--there is a slight discoloratuin to the carpet, quite faint. Our carpet is old so its no biggie to us but you might not agree so spot test 1st.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie E. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work...
customer_reviews.text: I recently fostered a puppy in my pet free home for a few weeks. For whatever reason he had an absolute fascination with making sure to use my area rug as a potty pad. Tried this product, followed directions per their website (they don't print instructions on the bottle, tell you to text a phone number) and ultimately ended up renting a rug doctor. The scent was beyond overwhelming, my husband absolutely hated it.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Least tolerable fragrance of all these sprays
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell if it is neutralizing the cat urine odor because it's acrid fragrance hangs in the air for hours after even just a couple sprays. To me, this spray smells like stinky feet. Not better than the urine odor. Going back to the unscented spray.
customer_reviews.author: Lh

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: There are no instructions on the bottle, it says to text a number? I’ve texted like 5 times with no response, I called no answer, so I don’t even know if I’m doing it correctly, but anyways, odors came back after a few hours.... waste of money and customer service non-existent... very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Yulya Ryns

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent
customer_reviews.text: Prior to this product, I have tried a million other products, and this is seriously superb. Ok just FYI, to begin I have only owned a doggie for a year, so still, every day is a learning process. My dog has a designated grass type of potty area out on the balcony, and summer was super challenging for me as the smell of urine would seriously not lift from the concrete ground. My dog sucks at aiming, but that does not matter anymore because of this liquid savior. I seriously feel like I have my balcony back and we are back to barbequing again. :) Thank you for much
customer_reviews.author: Jennet

product_meta.title: BUBBAS Super Strength Commercial Enzyme Cleaner - Pet Odor Eliminator | Enzymatic Stain Remover | Remove Dog Cat Urine Smell from Carpet, Rug or Hardwood Floor and Other Surfaces
feature_bullets: BEST PROFESSIONAL GRADE CLEANING SOLUTION: Scientifically formulated to be more potent than other pet odor enzyme cleaners for your flooring, upholstery, area rugs and carpets, yet safe to use around kids and pets. Permanently destroys pet enzyme odors and stains

PET STAIN AND ODOR MIRACLE: Bubba's uses natural dormant bacteria that become active upon hitting that strong smelling cat pee, billions of enzymes destroy stains down to the carpet pad. Competitors use active bacteria that die off and lose effect

SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: Other pet odor enzyme sprays use active bacteria that are ineffective soon after you buy them. Bubba's dormant bacteria formula is the best premium deep cleaning stain and pet urine enzyme carpet cleaner or YOUR MONEY BACK

CARPET & RUG INSTITUTE CERTIFIED: Our Pet Pee Cleaner and Enzymatic Odor Remover is a Top Rated pet stain & odor miracle. Don't be disappointed by other brands pet cleaner sprays. Try Bubbas pet enzyme treatment cleaner instead

MANY USES: Our enzyme based stain remover and cleaning solution can be used in all areas of your house, auto, kitchen, bathroom, laundry room and more. Use to remove shoe odor, clean auto carpeting stains, use as clothes pretreat for removal of tough set in grass stains. litter box cleaner, or on furniture to remove odor causing bacteria

specifications.Manufacturer: Bubba's Rowdy Friends Pet Supply Company
